etymology.description: A horizontal stroke, indicating the number 'one'.
etymology.interpretation: The character visually represents a single horizontal line, directly symbolizing the concept of one. This straightforward depiction makes it intuitive to understand its meaning at first glance.

examples.chinese: 我有一个苹果(我有一個蘋果)。
请给我一杯水(請給我一杯水)。
examples.pinyin: Qǐng gěi wǒ yī bēi shuǐ.
examples.english: Please give me one cup of water.
